content.text: I'd love to take my kids to the ballet in air conditioning.
That sounds lovely. I like the ballet too!
I always end up staring at my antique collection for hours.
Antiques are beautiful. I love looking at them!
I wake up early, spend time with my family, and work hard to provide for them.
I do the same thing. My kids are my first priority.
I have not been in a fight, but I've seen my sister in one.
I've had to deal with a lot of loss in my life, but I'm still here.
I'm sorry to hear that. Loss is never easy.
Thanks. It's been tough, but I'm getting through it.
Thanks. It's nice to talk to someone who understands.
